channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
channel.desc: Building wealth used to follow a formula, but these days it's easier than ever to play the markets. With investing tools at everyone's fingertips, is it a chance for generational wealth or a siren call for suckers?

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Bullish With Sonali Basak
channel.desc: Wall Street pros often play poker, chess, blackjack and other games that rely on skills that are highly transferable to their work; the lines between finance and gaming are blurring faster than ever.

channel.name: Bloomberg TV US
channel.title: Live: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
channel.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney, with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and bringing global investors everything they need to know as the trading day begins in Asia.
